Maze

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maze.Maze_Build
      • Maze.Maze

  • public class Maze
extends Maze_Build
    Responsible for game and maze management. Running this will allow console input.

      static class  Maze.MazeBuilder
      Provides a clean default maze

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • fullTurn

        public static void fullTurn()
        One full game turn The hero moves first, followed by the eagle and then the dragons

      • updateMaze

        public static void updateMaze()
        Updates the position of the symbols in the maze. This way the actors only need to leave behind them an empty space (or wall, in the eagle's case) when moving and don't need to be worry about leaving another symbol behind if they have crossed with another actor.

      • heroVsDragon
